text:
is it possible to use a variable (such as the output resulting from the format data function) in a workflow that creates a company based on a contact form?

i want to use this so that if someone uses a contact form and types in a their company  name "Test Company 1", it will create a company with the domain <http://www.testcompany1.com|www.testcompany1.com> , this way if another person uses Test Company 1, it will try to create a new company but fail and simply link it to the existing company based on the same domain name.
is there a simpler solution to this that i am missing?

We're actively working on bringing the use of inputs and outputs in more (most?) places across the app. We don't have anything concrete to show yet, but hope to open up a beta at some point. If you DM me I can have our PM add you to the beta when the time comes
